job_details.experience_required: Mid to Sr. (8-10 years+ of experience)
job_details.duration: 6 months to begin; open to ongoing engagement

jd: From: sanjay, Nitya software solutions Pvt ltd sanjay@nityainc.com Reply to: sanjay@nityainc.com Technical Business Analyst Baltimore, MD (Need local profiles).Note: Need VISA Independent consultants.USC/GC only with 12+ years About the role:Level of experience: Mid to Sr. (8-10 years+ of experience)Industry experience: Fixed Income, Finance, Wealth management, Investment managementRole experience: Technology Business AnalystFunctional Tools/Technologies: FactSet, Bloomberg Terminal, data mapping technologies, fixed income domain data providersRequested Start Date: ASAPDuration: 6 months to begin; open to ongoing engagement beyond that based on individual fit/project availabilityLocationBaltimore MD onsite 3 days a week; hybrid WFH 2 days a week*No T&L reimbursement for living out of area and commuting in*Description/SummaryMigrate reference data providers from FactSet to Bloomberg for the Fixed Income business unit.The effort is to analyze, identify and document the existing business processes, technology tools, internal and external connections, and data values leveraged by a Brown Advisory business unit (Fixed Income) of a specific reference data provider’s (FactSet) data sets. The analysis and documentation will be then used to define a new set of business processes, potentially technology toolset, and relevant data values using another reference data provider’s (Bloomberg) data sets.High-Level TasksMap and document current processes/fields/reports in FactSetPerform mapping exercise to BloombergCapture requirements, screenshots, voice of end user, to determine all key dependencies and needs for the migrationDocumentationEscalation of issues and risks, collaboration with key stakeholders for resolution and recurrence preventionMonitoring, analysis, and SLA management related to audit replies/responsesProviding status updates, supporting creation of presentation slidesOther efforts, as assigned
